aboutPortalText: The largest catalogue of professional photographers in Belarus. You can easily find a professional photographer on our site to suit your requirements.

photographsInfo.name: Marina Batyukova
photographsInfo.details: Belarusian artist, photographer. Member of the Belarusian Union of Artists, Belarusian Association of Public Photographers. He specializes in the field of documentary and conceptual photography. The author of the photo project «Sula. Neurvane», which has been exhibited in various countries. The project organically unites the rich centuries-old cultural heritage of Belarus, its folk rites, songs, costumes, on the one hand, and on the one hand, the manifestations of the modern urban environment, the elements of globalization that are rapidly intervening in the modern world.

timeline.title: University
paragraphs: Studentship at the Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics

photographsInfo.name: Tatsiana Tkacheva
photographsInfo.details: Independent journalist working with documentary photography, video, archive, and multimedia. Originally hailing from Mogilev region (Belarus), she is currently based in Minsk. Tatsiana graduated from Belarusian State University of Culture and Arts with a Degree in Cultural Studies in 2014, and from the Academy of Documentary Photography and Photojournalism, Fotografika, in St. Petersburg, Russia in 2016. She teaches photojournalism at the Johannes Rau International Education Centre (Minsk, Belarus), The Belarusian Association of Journalists (Minsk, Belarus). The most important part of her professional activities is devoted to personal, long-term projects that are focused on the women’s rights, particularly the topics of gender violence, conflict and resistance. Also, Tatsiana Tkachova works with subjects of borders, identity and isolation. Tatsiana has been a winner of various competitions. She is a recipient of World Press Photo 2020, and others. Tatsiana works with Belarusian and foreign media, including Takie Dela, The Guardian, Der Spiegel, De Volkskrant, Meduza.io, Esquire.ru, Ostpol.

timeline.title: Award
paragraphs: Received a degree in cultural studies from the Belarusian State University of Culture and Arts.

timeline.title: Teaching
paragraphs: Lecturer of the photojournalism course at the Belarusian Association of Journalists.

photographsInfo.name: Alexander Vasukovich
photographsInfo.details: Independent photographer based in Minsk, Belarus. Born in 1985 in Minsk. He began his career as a photojournalist in 2011.

timeline.title: Education
paragraphs: Academy of Public Administration under the aegis of the President of the Republic of Belarus.

timeline.title: Award
paragraphs: Direct look contest, finalist. Moscow, Russia

photographsInfo.name: Uladzimir Parfianok
photographsInfo.details: My photographic baptizing took place some 15 years ago -- in the mid-1980s of the century, which we already call last century… That was a time when rapid changes occurred in the Soviet photographic art, primarily caused by pre-Perestroyka intellectual ferment of the intelligentsia and unbridled energy of youths. Unexpectedly for many of us, photography became an easy instrument to freely (and uncontrollably!) ‘vivisect’ one’s own and public consciousness and critically analyze existing (or imposed) values. While many professional artists could only dream about freedom of creative expression, we -- so called independent photographers -- just lived on it…

timeline.title: Begining
paragraphs: In creative photography since the mid-1980s. He studied photography in the studio of Valery Lobko. Participated in numerous exhibition projects in Belarus and abroad. Creator and curator of the projects of the NOVA gallery. In photography - a supporter of analog technology and manual printing.

timeline.title: Work place
paragraphs: Working in Center of Modern Arts in Minsk.

photographsInfo.name: Victor Butra
photographsInfo.details: Famous and one of the most interesting Belarusian photographers, a member of the People's Photo Club "Minsk". Participant of numerous photography salons and exhibitions, he lives and works in the capital of Belarus. Meanwhile, the work of Viktor Butra can be called practically unexplored, and his contribution to the development of world photography is still not appreciated at all.

timeline.title: Education
paragraphs: Studied at the Faculty of Medicine of the Riga Medical Institute.

timeline.title: Education
paragraphs: Studied at the Faculty of Medicine of the Vitebsk Medical Institute.

photographsInfo.name: Yuriy Vasiliev
photographsInfo.details: He represented the Republic of Belarus and the Minsk photo club in the jury of more than 50 photo exhibitions. Honorary member of the "Rainbow" photo club (1982, Mogilev), Honorary member of the People's Photo Studio "Riga" (1977, Riga), Honorary member of the Lithuanian Photo Artists' Union. In 1992, Yuri Sergeevich was awarded the title "Honored Worker of Culture of the Republic of Belarus". Honorary member of the Belarusian Association of Photographers. From the early 80s to 2013, he participated in international photo seminars in Nida, Lithuania.

timeline.title: Work
paragraphs: Worked in engineering positions in his specialty.
